overview: With just about a week left until the end of the world, Wolverine and the rest of the X-Men dig in to uncover the shocking revelation that could bring it all to a halt. But they're also battling an equally menacing threat from within. Elsewhere, Xavier is sending information from the future that might help the X-Men solve the puzzle, and Angel is risking everything -- including his wings -- to challenge his father.
title: Wolverine and the X-Men: Revelation
